186025847.review:
This game is in my top 10 favorite games, it is definitely one of the best games I have ever played! I can talk for a long time and a lot about the storyline, about all the characters in the game, about the magnificent graphics, about the incredible music, about the excellent gameplay, about the good balance, about the leveling system, about the breathtaking challenges...

The game is great, and to understand this, you just have to play it yourself. I highly recommend this cool game to absolutely everyone!
================================================================================
Эта игра входит в топ 10 моих любимых игр, она определенно одна из лучших игр, что я играл за все время! Можно очень долго и много рассказывать, про сюжетную линию, про всех героев игры, про великолепную графическую картинку, про невероятную музыку, про отличный геймплей, про хороший баланс, про систему прокачки, про дух захватывающие испытания...

Игра великолепна, и чтобы понять это, надо просто самому в нее сыграть. Настоятельно рекомендую абсолютно всем эту классную игру!

186005442.review:
Bastion is a beautiful game through and through that goes for an avant-garde presentation while delivering clean, simple, action gameplay made enjoyable by the variety of weapons and upgrades.

The endings are a little light on narrative for me. The pretentious presentation warranted more. Oh well. They are very arcade-like endings for an arcade action-style game, so it's at least congruent in that aspect.

Having not played Transistor or Hades yet, I would say Bastion holds up very well more than a decade later.

185990187.review:
Good game even years later.
Aged like fine wine.

185962691.review: Играл 10 лет назад в это на хбокс 360, дальше первого уровня не прошел. Не понятно откуда вообще это у меня в библиотеке в стиме. Однообразно бежишь вперед, смотришь стильные уровни, все.

185950288.review: El juego "Bastion" es una buena experiencia para aquellas personas que no entienden muy bien los juegos de estilo aventura y mazmorra, aunque no se trata de eso como en el HADES, tiene cosas muy parecidas y creo que para empezar a moverte en el mundo interno que tiene Supergiant Games está bien. Es más sencilla de entender en la mecánica y la jugabilidad de cada arma y sus características. Te ponen retos para que los superes , además de mejorar al personaje con los tónicos cuando subes de nivel. La historia al principio no la entiendes, pero luego va cogiendo ritmo en cuanto avanzas. La música es pegadiza y hay algún tema que me ha gustado. Fue un gran experimento jugar con las plataformas sobre todo porque cada vez que avanzas aparece el ambiente y si te equivocas te puedes caer y hacerte daño. Si quieres pasar un buen rato y peleandote con algunos jefes, bastantes fuertes, no dudes en jugarlo.

185928011.review:
~геймдизайн. однообразные локации и противники, раздражающее управление и бесячие испытания.
~сюжет. что то происходит.
~графика. стильное.
+прекрасная сторонняя локализация.

185811649.review: Hades oyununu yapan firmanın ilk oyunu. Oyun döngüsü beni şu ana kadar eğlendirdi.

185700598.review: Back when story telling and gameplay was peak!

185662269.review: Uno de los clásicos de las primeras tandas de juegos indies que sigue sorprendiendo por la propuesta estética. Interesante si quieres hacer un juego en isométrica.

185608608.review:
Finally got to play this game after it spent an eternity in my backlog. I'm glad I did, there's clearly artistic effort behind it.

I like the game a lot mechanisms-wise. A lot of small details come together to show that people put some thought on this. Stuff like the delayed difficulty selection, the way mechanisms are introduced and taught, the way narrative is delivered mostly without stopping the gameplay, etc.

In an ideal world, I would wish the writing was better. I think the main point was weak, not going as hard and as deep as it could have. The hearts were in the right place though, and honestly aside from stuff like The Talos Principle, which game really has great writing?

Worth playing,

185436442.review: 《哈迪斯》的前身，整个游戏除了不是肉鸽，大部分还是挺相似的。随着剧情推进，解锁更多武器、物品和技能，还有能够自由开启的神像，跟《哈迪斯》的热度相同。整体游玩体验不错，拼接式的地图设计也很有特色。碎片化剧情看得云里雾里的，至今都没搞懂为什么乌拉一族要发动大灾变，还有佐尔夫为什么会被同族人背叛。

185417593.review: 今天终于全成就了，给未来玩这游戏想刷全成就的朋友一个帮助：这游戏可以通过ce修改回血和黑药的数量，做分数挑战时实在是懒得去再肝半周目装备的情况下，可以改下黑药的数量，技能选滤毒管炮台，去历史书开十神像刷一轮，基本上分数就够了

185397939.review: ES un juego lindon, no lo compraria, pero esta divertido... El narrador es un copado

185384390.review: Interestingly, I like Dreams more than the main campaign. For the campaign it feels a little claustrophobic at least for me...

185349868.review: There's a reason why I own everything Supergiant games developed. Because they're really good at telling a story and making it super fun. Highly recommended!

185337548.review: Downloaded back in 2011 played it through and was blown away with how simple yet complex the play style was and how detailed everything was from map layout to the combat system. With many ways to chose how you do your story or come back for another round I found my self binge playing until i completed the story and even after 14 years I came back and binged through for another round. I can say this game has replay value from loadouts to spirits and even upgrades.

Первая игра Supergiant представляет собой интерес лишь исторических раскопок или просто посмотреть, что делала студия раньше. По факту, имеем устаревшую и уныловатую боевку, которую приходится терпеть, чтобы пройти игру. Прокачка базы и оружия, на которую через час игры становится пoхуй, сюжет, в котором без дополнительного чтения интернетов не разобраться, но на него тоже становится пoхуй, да неплохой визуальный стиль и забавные комментарии закадровые. 
Но так как проходится она часов 6, то можно потыкать и определенное удовольствие получить.

185022277.review:
Jogão da porra
Um dos primeiros jogos que joguei quando era menor e cheguei a zerar de fato, continua incrível até hoje. Amo de paixão as musicas e a história desse jogo, como é que pode ser tudo tão bonito? Simplesmente fenomenal.
Não canso de falar como a trilha sonora desse jogo é magnifica, acho que uma das que mais gosto em todos os videogames que já joguei.
"Mother i'm here" pega no coração até hoje, impressionante haha

184932960.review:
老游戏特有的高难度，成就比较麻烦
风味不错，音画表现优秀。虽然画风可爱、人设男孩，但走的老游戏那种硬汉路线，一路杀穿，从无声主角和音乐风格也可以看出。这真是迷人
我喜欢Bynn the breaker这首
感觉深岩银河借鉴了这游戏不少

184884119.review:
Comprei os jogos da Supergiant pra maratonar um tempo atrás e vou começar o ano jogando eles. 

Esse jogo definitivamente não era o que eu esperava! Com o pouco que sabia dele, só as imagens de relance e algumas músicas, eu achava que seria uma aventura mais relaxante e de puzzle/plataforma? Sei lá. Com certeza não esperava um jogo de combate, combate, combate com uma história um tanto quanto sombria.

Zerei ele (e sofri muito pra platina dele um tanto quanto torturante) e que jogo espetacular! Uma das melhores trilhas sonoras que já ouvi! 
A ambientação absurda! 
A interpretação do narrador principal é genial! 
A história também é muito envolvente. O estilo de arte mais fofo e colorido serve como um ótimo fundo pro enredo bem pesado e carregado.
O combate é a bastante divertido e quanto mais armas e habilidades vai desbloqueando, abre milhares de estilos diferentes. 
Jogaço ótimo pra começar o ano!

metete el hades en el orto.
aguante bastion.

THAT BEING SAID, I wholeheartedly recommend this game. The audio alone is worth full price. If you have ever cared about audio in a game you need to get this one.

184402512.review: Quite enjoyed this, the gameplay loop, visual style and soundtrack alone make this worth playing. Key point is that while not every weapon plays the exact same, they found a way to make most feel very satisfying.

184398248.review: A great game, kinda sad in parts, really wish there was another part to the series.

184381306.review:
The Good:
- Interesting, bittersweet little story about loneliness, regret and the importance of letting go. Don't play looking for Undertale-level storytelling, but there's enough here to make you think, especially at the end.
- Game looks gorgeous. No ugly browns here -- colours are vibrant and the levels are busy without becoming cluttered.
- Music: A soundtrack that perfectly matches the frontier, wild-west vibes of the visuals.
- Wide variety of weapons that each have their own unique upgrade paths.

The Mid:
-It's short. That may or may not be a problem for you. I played almost 6 hours and was able to complete, I would say, 85% of content. Outside of the story, the extra content is an exam level for each weapon, and a handful of "marathon" levels where you kill waves of enemies back to back. Beyond that, not much. The game comes with "Vigils" (challenges) but you'll clear most of them just by playing normally. There's a New Game Plus mode but it doesn't add much. I would not buy this game at full price, but it's an easy recommend when Supergiant puts it on an 80% sale.
- The base game is *very* easy. The game expects you to push up the difficulty by activating idols, which gives enemies extra abilities like healing over time or damage on contact. The trouble is, the rewards for this is just XP...which you won't need...because the base game is very easy. The only thing levelling up unlocks is the ability to equip extra Spirits and give yourself extra powers. Which, see above.
- The combat is...inoffensive. Similar to Hades, but very watered down.
- The Narrator. No getting around him. For the most part, I found him fine. He's well voice-acted, but his "sad old cowboy musing on the past" schtick can verge on parody at times. In the longer levels, large amounts of his dialogue seem to be talking for the sake of talking.

The Bad
- The last weapons the game gives you are also, for some reason, the most annoying and difficult to use. 
- Only being able to equip one secret skill at a time is quite odd and a bit lacklustre.
- The Proving Grounds, despite what they claim, are not really a test of skill. You need to upgrade your weapons with the right buffs and equip the right Spirits to take first place in most of them. For instance, the Bow Proving Ground needs you to max out the Bow's piercing ability to be successful. Given you have to return to the Bastion to swap out your buffs and upgrades, this makes things more of a hassle than they needed to be.

184379249.review: Supergiant's first game and therefore a must-play. You can see the evolution going from here to Hades and it is mindblowing how much wokred with their first project.

184174092.review:
Great game, still holds up well 13 years after release.

Love the art style, the story, and the world building. Whoever voiced Rucks did an amazing job, the narration adds a ton of character and charm. Gameplay is fun and the loadout choices add a ton of variety, especially for NG+ and the optional survival missions.

The story only takes a few hours to get through, but there's enough replayability and optional content that makes it a totally worthwhile purchase.

Definitely recommend it!

The story was fine, the visuals were pretty (the rising ground stuff in particular was extraordinary). The combat left some to be desired and it was overall a very easy game even with the extra difficulty modifiers. they just pour healing pots on you lol. Solid 7.5/10

184061329.review: Вроде бы все хорошо, но очень быстро надоедает. Визуально игра выглядит потрясающе: уровень будто бы строится прямо перед тобой. Геймплейно игра тоже на первый взгляд смотрится привлекательно: разработчик постоянно предлагает новое оружие, которое должно разнообразить геймплей, но что касается врагов - это то, что все портит... Уж настолько они получились однообразными, если кто новый и появляется, то он скорее больше раздражает какой-то очередной неуязвимостью, что в свою очередь еще и ломает темп игры. Вообщем это для меня первый проект гигантов, с которого я решил начать. Надеюсь другие проекты для меня будут все же по-интереснее.

184021463.review: Look. I don't like buying bad games. Matter of fact I don't like buying games at all. Personally I LOVED this game. Worth the buy. Worth the time in it. Phenomenal.

183965162.review:
俯視角ARPG

可以攜帶兩把武器, 一近戰, 一遠程
隨著遊戲解鎖, 大約10把武器左右

可以做的特殊動作:前滾閃避(沒有耐力條限制), 盾反
遠程武器是自動reload, 沒有彈藥限制

特殊技能(只能選一種), 釋放會花費黑色藥水, 黑色藥水在遊戲中可以補充

每種武器會有訓練場, 根據成績獲得獎勵, 獎勵是用來提升武器的素材
隨著劇情進行, 探索地圖蒐集碎片建設家園, 陸續開啟, 鐵匠鋪, 商店, 成就系統等

劇情主線一本道, 最後地方二選一選擇結局

整題遊戲偏易, 動作難度不高

元素拆解:
經典ARPG, 系統該有都有
從頭到尾碎念的旁白
繪本風美術
BGM, 女聲歌曲好聽
難度偏易, 可自行增加難度
遊戲長度不長, 5小時內

主要學習點:

動作遊戲的基本能力
	-翻滾閃敵人, 不貪刀
	-盾反抓節奏, 回饋大
	-拉弓和一些武器需要節奏
	
缺點:

戰鬥沒空看旁白字幕, 也沒心力聽英文(可能為英文原生者來說更容易)
變成故事內容幾乎沒get到
缺少BOSS戰鬥

183925534.review: Jogo bom, me deixou bem confusa, mas bom.

183881928.review:
Because I love Hades, I tried to play previous games from this dev, starting from Bastion.

For their first game, this is very well-made and polished.

It has simple gameplay, but fun. The models of the map is similar to Hades (top-down and isometric). If you're familiar with the OST style of Hades, you'd feel nostalgic listening to the one in this game. The MC could carry 2 weapons at the same time. There's also a shrine to put up debuffs just like Hades’ pact of punishment. 

Unfortunately everyone in this game are not voiced except for the narrator that voiced the characters’ thoughts and story. The downside of this is that I wouldn't be able to catch what the narrator is saying most of the time if I'm too focused on the battles at hand. The only time the characters are voiced are at the ending. It's a shame because I love Hades so much because everyone and everything is fully voiced there. 

The storyline is quite unique even though the setting has been used countless times by other games or media (post-calamity world). There are several options near the end that determine the ending(s). 

In the end, Bastion is a short game. But because there's so many customization, content, and areas to explore, the experience didn't feel short at all!  I thought I've spent around 10 hours finishing this game, turned out it's just around 5 hours. 

7/10

183868202.review:
难度较低的刷刷刷类型游戏
游戏玩法单一，就是打怪，爽感确实是有，但是游戏流程太短。
音乐好评
以前玩过手机版，但没仔细看过游戏的具体内容，没想到还是挺离谱的。
成就系统过于逆天，无法完成的全成就
配音丰富的旁白好评，但是剧情过于碎片化，让人摸不着头脑，等通关后把旁白的剧情理一遍就会发现：主角所在的国家充斥民粹主义，主角收留的那个女孩的父亲是毁灭世界的那个人，而主角却打着创造避难所“堡垒”重启世界的旗号杀害其它幸存者，抢夺城市碎片；最后主角竟然还能救一个背叛自己的叛徒，整的那么悲壮；主角团队竟然成为了拯救世界的人，剧情宣传的思维实在是不敢恭维。

Great game that I never played before, I know, I'm a couple years too late. 
Such a cool game that I played through twice. I normally never play through games multiple times. Second run was more so a speed run type.

183659531.review:
The story is intriguing, if not engrossing. The presentation is interesting, if not stunning. The combat is fine, if not airtight. Bastion really needed just one more unique angle to make it stand out from other games like it.

Unfortunately, what the developers thought that angle should be was some of the most wildly inappropriate voiceover narration I’ve ever heard in my life. Guys, did we play the same game? The narrator is easily the worst part about it for me. It baffles me that someone thought it would be a good idea to create a lush fantasy world with a plucky young knight and pair it with someone who sounds like Marv from Sin City gently caressed a Ford commercial.

183647617.review: Muy entretenido si tiene una tarde libre para estar tranquilo es muy recomendado.

183631104.review: eski oyunlardan biri hadesin öncüsü gibi

183613584.review: Very Good Game. sharp controls, awesome art style, game play on point.

183601422.review: If I had to think about a game from my childhood, one of the first that comes to mind is Bastion. It's the first game from Supergiant Games, and thanks to nostalgia, it remains my favorite title they've released. Even today, I still listen to its soundtrack, especially 'Mother, I'm Here' and 'Build That Wall.' It's a short game, taking only 10-15 hours to complete, so it never overstays its welcome. For its current price, this game is an absolute steal in my opinion.

183599703.review:
I just recently purchased the game, I had to try something else by Supergiant. I loved every second of Hades, and I've really enjoyed going through the early access with Hades II from day one.  It was amazing on day 1, and it's so much bigger and better now.

I have only played about 5 minutes of this game, but it's a steal at 3.00. Supergiant is uniquely creative, and Bastion is a uniquely creative game.  The narration is something truly special, it grabs your attention the second play begins.  I have a few games I need to finish up, but I will be returning to play this game through, and give it a better review.  

It will make you smile in the first 10 seconds of play, what else can you ask for? Well I guess you can hope the fun continues.  I have no doubt that it will.

183594354.review: Игру в первую очередь на своем горбу тащит атмосфера создаваемая музыкой и озвучкой наратива, ну и стилистика не совсем стандартная, при чем они выполнены на таком уровне что равнодушным останется почти никто. К сожалению геймплей тут на троечку из 5 по ощущениям. Наратив конечно дико доставил удовольствие, но зачищать локи было если честно далеко не интересно.

183565513.review: 战斗上不难，但一堆能坠落的地方，结果人物又不够听话，走路有点刹不住车，有时候挺折磨的。总体上有个中上水平吧
